subtitle: Your personal weather companion
aboutDescription: Weather App is a Progressive Web Application that provides accurate weather information for any location worldwide. Built with React and Material-UI, it offers a seamless experience across all devices.

install.title: Install Weather App
install.subtitle: Install our app for a better experience
install.description: Install Weather App to get quick access and enjoy offline features.
install.step1: Tap the menu button (⋮) in your browser
install.step2: Select 'Add to Home screen' from the menu

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Weather App, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our weather application.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect minimal personal data necessary for providing weather information. This includes your location data (with your permission) and basic device information. We do not collect or store any personal identifying information.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Your data is used solely for providing accurate weather information and improving our service. We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to maintain your preferences and improve your experience. These cookies are necessary for the app to function properly and cannot be disabled.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use weather data from trusted third-party providers. These services have their own privacy policies and data handling practices.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@weatherapp.com

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Weather App. By using our application, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

usage.title: Usage Terms
usage.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use this application. You agree to use the app in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

accuracy.title: Weather Data Accuracy
accuracy.content: While we strive to provide accurate weather information, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of weather forecasts. Weather conditions can change rapidly.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Weather App is not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our service, including but not limited to weather-related decisions.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at terms@weatherapp.com
